text: Holy Wood (In the Shadow of the Valley of Death) is the fourth studio album by American rock band, Marilyn Manson. It came out on November 13, 2000 in the United Kingdom, November 14, 2000 in Australia and United States and on December 5, 2000 in Japan. The producers of the album were Marilyn Manson and Dave Sardy. The album was the first album that Marilyn Manson released after the Columbine High School massacre that took place on April 20, 1999. ==Reception== ===Critical reception=== ==Track listing== ;Notes * The disc contains a data track which leads to a video no longer hosted by Interscope's website. This video was later included as a secret track on the companion DVD of Lest We Forget. ==Charts, certifications and procession== ===Album charts=== Charts (2000) Peak position Australia (ARIA) 8 Austria (Ö3) 6 Belgium (Flanders) (Ultratop 50) 34 Belgium (Wallonia) (Ultratop) 29 Canada (CANOE)Billboard 200 and Canadian Albums charting. billboard.com.
